name: Ur In Trouble
description:
This dogs world will turn on its head, and it doesn't even know it yet! After enjoying its night out at a bar, hydrating a lot by drinking a lot of water, it is tricked into activating a bomb! Now, a poor dog has to make an ultimate sacrifice for the world! It needs to pee, but there's a bomb that needs defusing. Can it control his bladder until he defuses the bomb?

Made for GMTK 2020 Game Jam, for the theme "out of control". We wanted to make a ridiculous out of control situation where there's a lot of things happening and players are struggling to keep it together, just like the dog. We wanted the players to FEEL like the dog, we even included a doggo vision.

Note: sadly the web version doesn't wanna cooperate, so please download and play!

Features:

  • Play as the fearless dog
  • Hold in your pee
  • Defuse the bomb
  • Become a hero
  • Features a lot of pee

Controls:

  • Use ASDF buttons and press them in time with the on screen prompts.
  • Press LMB to interact with items
  • Click and hold the mouse to drag objects between screens

Notes:

- all credits to the font maker of chocoletta Peter Olexa

- all credits to the person owning the bomb picture used

If you need more credits please contact me.
